front.title: GSM SIM Authentication Mode for IKE

abstract.t: This document presents a challenge-response authentication method based on the GSM Subscriber Identity Module (SIM). The method is used for authenticating a remote IPSec user to a security gateway. The examples in the document are based on modified IKE main mode. In the authentication phase a shared secret is generated utilizing the GSM SIM and then used to authenticate the IKE exchange as well.
